mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BOARD(SEQ , TITLE, WRITER, CONTENT, DB_STATUS) VALUES((SELECT (MAX(SEQ)+1) FROM BOARD) , #{title},#{writer},#{content} , 'A')
mapper.delete: UPDATE BOARD SET DB_STATUS = 'D' WHERE SEQ = #{seq}
mapper.select:
SELECT * FROM BOARD WHERE DB_STATUS = 'A'
AND TITLE LIKE '%'||#{searchKeyword}||'%'
AND CONTENT LIKE '%'||#{searchKeyword}||'%'
ORDER BY SEQ DESC
